sentences.sContent: I want to compute the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.sContent_eng: I want to compute the length of the hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.sCn: 我想计算下,直角三角形的斜边。

sentences.sContent: This time, you create a simple textbox form that corresponds to the opposite and hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.sContent_eng: This time, you create a simple textbox form that corresponds to the opposite and hypotenuse of a right triangle.
sentences.sCn: 这次，创建的是一个简单的文本框表单，对应于直角三角形的对边和斜边。

sentences.sContent: For example the square on hypotenuse of a right angle triangle is equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
sentences.sContent_eng: For example the square on hypotenuse of a right angle triangle is equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides.
sentences.sCn: 例如，直角三角形斜边的平方,等于其它两边的平方和。

trans.tranOther: the longest side of a  triangle  that has a  right angle
